availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Wendt (Newport, Kentucky, blacksmith and city councilman)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, blacksmith and city councilman. Native of Prussia. Married to Louisa Wiechert Wendt in Hamilton County, Ohio, on May 1, 1847. Father of Amelia Wendt, Anna Wendt, Emma Wendt, and Edward Wendt. Blacksmith in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Blacksmith in Campbell County in 1860. City councilman in Newport in Campbell County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 5, p. 418.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 154.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 8.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film 000344459, p. 371.
"Heinrich ‘Henry’ Wendt (1823-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial 107226889, accesed July 11, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/107226889.
KYR-0001-029-0586.
